TopicTitle: The one thing that really grinds your gears.

Articles.Content: Gay haters. If you don't like gays, at least keep it to yourself. We don't want to hear about it.
Necro, Please ignore

One Acronym: PETA.

*facepalms* don't get me started.

People Eating Tasty Animals?

What's wrong with that?

What really grinds my gears? When I forget to press the clutch when I shift gears.

In all seriousness: When someone constantly bugs me for help when they can easily use the computer right in front of them. Or, when the answer is just obvious.
People who go out of their way to hate other people for liking something they don't.
The most annoying thing.... spending hours on end in the VAB or SPH, take it out to fly it, and it just blows up on the Launchpad.
Leaving the parachute in the first stage.. twice in a row...

leaving the parachute in the first stage.. Twice in a row...

oh gods i hate that too! Graaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaagh!!!! *ded*
Torque and Axles.
When people don't use serial commas.

So it turns out that I might finally have a chance with a girl!

She lives 1000 miles away from me.
Grammar errors while typing on forum threads.

Conspiracy theorists. Especially galaxander, some dude in the Flat Earth Society who thinks that we faked the ISS and the Shuttle-his comments drip from so much stupidity that merely reading them makes me cringe in both embarrasment at the human race and anger. Read at your own risk.

http://www.clubconspiracy.com/forum/showthread.php?t=8084

I want to grab him, slap him in the face, then dump cold water on him until some sense is knocked into his mind.
Idiots that think their smart.

My little brother BIG TIME!

and mass punishment. I mean wtf 3 dudes in my class made plenty noise and the whole class (including me and my quiet self) get detention T___T
I think that human reasoning is enough t bug me

The internet. There are some great places on it, like these very forums, but a very large majority of it is just viruses, cyberbullies, spammers, and...other bad things. I think we should just wipe it out and start over.

Edited December 19, 2013 by quasarrgames
The small vocal minority of Atheists, Christians, Muslims, or anyone else that forces their beliefs on others and think they are superior for it
Call of duty fanboys. 'Nuff said.
When people capitalize every single word in a sentence. Makes me want to just explode
Bullies and people who act like 5 year olds in high-school.
People who whine and complain when they have to do work at my school.
Programming, sometimes. You miss that one parenthesis, and you're f******.

New one.

Anti-fighting rules at school. Some kid is really racist and mean-he often tries to embarrass me in public, but I can't fight him for fear of getting bad marks, a detention, or worse, and hurting my social standing or reputation.
same here... it's like they expect you to just stand there and get punched...
